resources.string: Please turn off the power of the Olympus Air before charging.
LED is blinking (blue or green) when video is not being recorded.
LED is flashing slowly in green.
It is in the sleep mode. It will return to the sleep mode when any operation is performed. If left unattended, the power will automatically turn off.
How do I set the clock on the Olympus Air?
I cannot shoot sequentially or shoot videos.

You can use sequential shooting or video shooting only when you have set the save destination set to the microSD card in the Olympus Air. Please set save destination to microSD card of the Olympus Air in the settings screen of a dedicated app.
I want to return the network settings to the state at the time of purchase (I forgot the network connection settings).

Please operate the following with the power off and microSD card removed.

 1. Push the power button briefly with the shutter button pressed all the way down and the lens release lever pulled all the way.

 2. Once the power goed on, it will automatically turn off.

 3. Again, turn the power on and you can use the network settings in the state at the time of purchase.
Although the Olympus Air is on, the controls do not work.
Please press down on the power button for about 8 seconds and the Olympus Air will reboot.
